movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sampath V. Kumar
Starring by: Vibeesh, Priyanka Jawalkar, Sanjeev
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Raghav, a young man suffers from a unique disorder of dreaming every time he falls asleep and discussing about it. However, one fine morning he has no recollection of the dream he had the previous night, which puts him in an uncertain situation and the only way to get out is to remember the dream. As he tries had to recollect he learns about his long lost love.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Vijay Milton
Starring by: Vikram, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Pasupathy
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Vikram is a fancy car driver who delivers various parcels for the bad guys. One fine day, he is given a special parcel and is asked to deliver a particular car to some unknown people. When he reaches half of his destination, he comes to know that he is kidnapping a girl called Shakeela along with the car. Rest of the story is as to how he saves the girl from the bad guys.

movieInfo:
Directed by: BVS Ravi
Starring by: Sai Dharam Tej, Mehreen Pirzada, Prasanna
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Jai (Sai Dharam Tej) is a patriotic man for whom the nation always comes first. He harbours the dream to work for the DRDO and wants nothing else from life. But what happens when an evil mastermind Keshav (Prasanna) makes a plan to harm the nation?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Srinu Vaitla
Starring by: Varun Tej, Lavanya Tripathi, Hebah Patel
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Mister is the story of a happy-go-lucky guy who falls for a girl and is loved by another one. The tale of triangular love story embedded with family emotions and a dose of director marked comedy.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ram Gopal Varma
Written by: Prashant Pandey
Starring by: Shatrughan Sinha, Vivek Oberoi, Suriya
Genres: Action, Biography, Crime, Drama, History, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Based in Anandpur, Andhra Pradesh, Pratap Ravi, who lives with his expectant wife, Nandini, is fully engrossed in avenging the brutal death of his father, Veera Bhadra and brother, Shankar. He is now invited by actor-turned-politician, Shivaji Rao, to join politics and end the bloodshed. Pratap does so, but must face …

movieInfo:
Directed by: John Krish, Peter Sykes
Written by: Barnet Bain
Starring by: Brian Deacon, Rivka Neuman, Alexander Scourby
Genres: Biography, Drama, Family, History
Country: USA
Language: Telugu

Directed by: Pavan Mallela
Starring by: Nara Rohit, Regina Cassandra, Ramya Krishnan
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu + ESub
movieDescription: Balu(Nara Rohit) is a conman who is given the responsibility of safe guarding Aadhya(Regina) from a dreaded faction group in Rayalaseema. The villain gang chases Aadhya and Balu keeps saving her all the time and safely takes her to her family.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Mahesh Surapaneni
Starring by: Nara Rohit, Nanditha, Naga Shourya
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Arjun (Nara Rohith) is a superstar, famous for his roles as a menacing villain in many films. Shourya (Naga Shourya) is an actor who doesn’t get enough recognition despite playing roles of a justice-seeking hero on screen.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Brad Peyton
Written by: Carlton Cuse, Andre Fabrizio
Starring by: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, Alexandra Daddario
Genres: Action, Drama, Thriller
Country: USA, Australia, Canada
Language: Telugu (India)

Director : Aravind S D
Starring by: Avinash Narasimhraj, Prakash Belawadi, Deepa Gowda
Genres: Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A group of friends head for trekking to a famous mountain area near Aruku valley. Suddenly, one of the members in the team, Pruthvi gets lost in the chaos and finds himself in no man’s land. After a lot of struggle, he reaches a small village and takes a bus back to the city. Within no time, the bus gets into an accident and the driver goes missing. Everyone in the bus starts searching for the driver and ends up in a mysterious location in the jungle. Rest of the story is as to how Pruthvi saves himself from this crazy situation and gets out safe.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Vasanthabalan
Starring by: Aadhi, Pasupathy, Dhansika
Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film set in 18th century is all about a group of people who steals from the wealthy to provide food and shelter for their tribe. Kombodhi (Pasupathy) is the gang leader and during one of his missions he meets the brave Varupuli (Aathi). He brings Varupuli to his village and a bond develops between the two. But Varupuli has a past and his real name is Chinna. For the death of a youth (Thogaimayan) from neighbouring village, the King had in fact ordered one youth to be given as offering to the Almighty and Chinna was the choice. Sequence of events lead to Chinna escaping from the offering only to find out the mystery behind Thogaimayan’s death. But that was too late as too many things happened in his village by then. Now he goes on the hiding. Cut to present, Chinna is taken to be offered to God. What happens then forms the climax.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Howard McCain
Written by: Dirk Blackman, Howard McCain
Starring by: Jim Caviezel, Sophia Myles, Ron Perlman
Genres: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi
Country: USA
Language: Telugu + English + Esub
movieDescription: In 709 AD, in the Iron Age, a spacecraft crashes in the Viking kingdom of Herot, Norway, and the pilot Kainan survives. He turns the beacon on; learns the language and culture of the planet using a machine; and finds that the predator, Moorwen, that he was transporting, had escaped. While chasing the alien monster, he finds a village completely destroyed and is arrested by the warrior Wulfric, believing that he killed the locals – Kainan is brought to Herot as a prisoner.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Srivas
Starring by: Manchu Manoj Kumar, Manchu Vishnu, Hansika Motwani
Genres: Action, Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: In the Andhra Pradesh-Karnataka border, there are 2 villages named Pandavapuram and Kauravapuram. Dharmanna (Giri Babu) is the Head of Pandavapuram village who is considered as the latest descendant of the Pandavas while Suyodhana (Mukesh Rishi) is the Head of Kauravapuram village who too is considered as the latest descendant of the Kauravas. As expected, Dharmanna is a good Samaritan while Suyodhana is a dangerous criminal who runs a quarry business. Similar to the tale of Mahabharatha, here in this film too, Dharmanna and Suyodhana play the game of cards in which Suyodhana fails which makes him to follow the stipulation of the game – No celebration, marriage and any good events should not be conducted for 14 years.

movieInfo:
10 (TEN) Movie Info:
Directed and written by: Vijay Milton
Starring by: Vikram, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Pasupathy
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Tamil
movieDescription: Vikram is a remarkable driver, who is able to do the incredible in just ten seconds. He is a complete stranger that his name remains unknown even to his close associates. As he is a transporter, he prefers to introduce himself with different names like James Bond, Kamal Haasan, Mani Ratnam. When Vikram meets Shakeela (Samantha), his life turns upside down as she is wanted by the most deadly terrorists in Uttarkhand. Why are they in search for her? Will Vikram save her life?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Stephen Chow
Written by: Stephen Chow, Kan-Cheung Tsang
Starring by: Stephen Chow, Wei Zhao, Yat-Fei Wong
Genres: Action, Comedy, Sport
Country: Hong Kong, China
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Omkar
Written by: Abburi Ravi
Starring by: Nagarjuna Akkineni, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Seerat Kapoor
Genres: Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu + HC-Esub
movieDescription: The story of the film is set amidst a resort which is owned by three close friends. As time passes by, the boy gang starts facing weird experiences through an evil spirit(Samantha). Left with no choice, they approach a mentalist called Rudra(Nagarjuna).
